title: WRESTLINGSHIBA
author: WRESTLINGSHIBA
created_time: October 27, 2022, 12:01:34 PMLast edit: September 21, 2023, 10:18:03 AM by WRESTLINGSHIBA
content: https://i.postimg.cc/s2tCP9g7/IMG-20221005-071721-976.jpgOur VisionWhat are our goals and what drives us to achieve them?The Wrestling Shiba team looks towards creating the next blockbuster fighting game with esports competition in mind. Our aspirations towards building an AAA-level game are what first sets us apart from others in the NFT gaming industry.Such an undertaking used to be impossible for independent studios, but today with the fundraising capabilities of the crypto and NFTs this is a realistic and achievable goal.Paying homage to the old-school fighting games we all grew up with, Wrestling Shiba looks to take that inspiration and apply it to the industry-defining innovation possible with blockchain technology.Wrestling Shiba is focused on building a free-to-play competitive fighting game with PVP & eSports at the forefront of development and design decisions. Fight Legends is fight gaming, simply improved through blockchain technology as opposed to being the center of attention at the behest of gameplay that’s dynamic and fun.SHIBA WRESTLER AI Fair Launchhttps://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0x3b114ADFF9F0263c37c45c3ef8fc79C5907B8B03?chain=BSCTotal Supply   1,000,000,000 SWWEAITokens For Presale   360,000,000 SWWEAITokens For Liquidity   179,928,000 SWWEAISoft Cap   50 BNBPresale Start Time   2023.09.21 11:00 (UTC)Presale End Time   2023.09.23 11:00 (UTC)BIG DATAContract0x30318737756Db8239859fc697426016eAB525f35Explorerhttps://bscscan.com/token/0x30318737756db8239859fc697426016eab525f35Sourcecodehttps://bscscan.com/token/0x30318737756db8239859fc697426016eab525f35#codehttps://github.com/WrestlingShiba/sourcecode/blob/main/SWWEAI%20sourcecodeTokenomicshttps://github.com/WrestlingShiba/tokenomics/blob/main/tokenomics-incl-wrestling-SWWEAI-shiba-inu-tiken-crypto-eth-0x30318737756Db8239859fc697426016eAB525f35.pngWhitepaperhttps://github.com/WrestlingShiba/Whitepaper/blob/main/WHITEPAPER-Wrestling-Shiba-AI-SWWEAI_V.1.02.beta_0x30318737756Db8239859fc697426016eAB525f35%20(1).pdfAudithttps://blocksafu.com/audit/0x30318737756Db8239859fc697426016eAB525f35Roadmaphttps://github.com/WrestlingShiba/WWE_Roadmap/blob/main/RoadmapTOKENOMIC`Shttps://i.postimg.cc/CL1chN0y/tokenomics-incl-wrestling-SWWEAI-shiba-inu-tiken-crypto-eth-0x30318737756-Db8239859fc697426016e-AB525f.pngOUR MISSION AND VALUESPLAY2EARNWrestling Shiba will offer players chance to earn WWE token everytime they play our game.Weekly GiveawaysEach week Wrestling Shiba will give away a PlayStation 5 to a random lucky HOLDR. All you have to do is HOLD and, well, that's it.Monthly TournamentsYour competitive urge won't be happier elsewhere. Join our Telegram group to compete. Become a winner of the monthly tournament and walk away with up to $5000.StakingReady to make some real money? You can stake your $Wrestling Shiba on our platform and earn interest as high as up to 500% every Day. That's right, every single Day!ROADMAPPhase 01Website launchMarketing push to spread awareness5000 telegram membersWWE contract developmentFirst auditOwnership renouncedWrestling Shiba Swap launch (Android v1.1.1)Phase 02Influencer marketing pushWrestling Shiba Swap launch (IOS v.1.1.2)Listing on CG/CMC25,000 telegram members25,000 holdersWebsite redesignWWE Beta Launch v1.1.3Certik auditVoluntary donation for community + charity partnershipPhase 03100,000 holders100,000 telegram membersWWE Full app launch (v1.1.4)Large influencer marketing pushListings on major (LBank / Azbit)Wrestling Shiba Beta LaunchTEAM BEHIND THE PROJECTCEO - Frederic Panhttps://t.me/fredericpanCOO - Bilal Gurteshttps://t.me/BilalGurtes_Wwehttps://twitter.com/BGurteswwe?t=OEI1JNqsYB3Vge2zkGlqtw&s=09CTO - Marina Doplingerhttps://t.me/MarinaDoplinger_wwehttps://twitter.com/MDoplingerWWE?t=lq-mMoq6N9LdOSmZtMrEAg&s=09A game made for gamers, by gamers. – Wrestling ShibaWWE SOCIAL`SWebseitehttps://www.wrestlingshiba.comGithubhttps://github.com/WrestlingShibaReddithttps://www.reddit.com/r/wrestling_Shiba_WWE/Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100086342382778Twitterhttps://twitter.com/shibawrestlingaTelegramhttps://t.me/shibawrestleraiYouTubehttps://www.youtube.com/@SHIBAWrestlerAILinktreehttps://linktr.ee/shibawrestlerTik Tokhttps://www.tiktok.com/@shibawrestleraiDiscordhttps://discord.gg/3yXgf4cgMediumhttps://medium.com/@wrestling.ShibaBitcointalkhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3513502;sa=showPostsEmailcontact@wrestlingshiba.comsupport@wrestlingshiba.comGET IN THE RING WITH UShttps://i.postimg.cc/mZjgQJ7s/maxresdefault.jpg

comments.body: Your website gives the 502 ErrorI have seen on your recent post that you have a new project and it's not gaining traction as expected especially on Bitcointalk where all this game starts. I would like to introduce you to my service I offer in the blockchain/crypto industry since 2017.1. Whitepaper or lite paper writing - this is an important document to help explain your concept to key investors and target users which helps in adoption of the project.2. Pitch deck3. Website content4. Press release - especially when launching a new project or announcing upcoming features or any other news component. As well I offer press release publishing on my site www.coinweez.com.5. Marketing plan and campaign drafting6. Web banner ad placement on coinweez.comFor more info contact me on telegram @ICO_Services or reply to this DM.
